sentences.en: a gift for languages
sentences.cn: 语言天赋

sentences.en: As a youth he discovered a gift for teaching.
sentences.cn: 年轻的时候他就发现了自己教书的天赋。

sentences.en: Enjoy a free gift with any purchase of $20 or more.
sentences.cn: 购物满20美元奉送礼品一份。

sentences.en: expensive wedding gifts
sentences.cn: 昂贵的结婚礼物

sentences.en: God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well.
sentences.cn: 生命是上天赐予我们的礼物，能否好好享受这个礼物，取决于我们自己。

sentences.en: He gave her a gift to betoken his gratitude.
sentences.cn: 他送她一件礼物表示感谢.

sentences.en: Her Aunt Sallie gave her an uncharacteristically extravagant gift.
sentences.cn: 萨莉姨妈送给她一件贵得离谱的礼物。

sentences.en: Her grandmother had the gift of making people happy.
sentences.cn: 她奶奶有逗人开心的本事。

sentences.en: His gift was an extremely kind gesture. Credit where credit's due.
sentences.cn: 他的礼物是很友好的表示，这值得称赞。

sentences.en: I regard creativity both as a gift and as a skill.
sentences.cn: 我认为创造力既是一种天赋也是一种技巧。

sentences.en: nine seats in parliament were now in his gift.
sentences.cn: 议会中的九个席位他有授予权。

sentences.en: She banded the birthday gift with a silk strip.
sentences.cn: 她用一根丝带扎好了生日礼物.

sentences.en: Thanks for your gift — it will always remind me of you.
sentences.cn: 谢谢你们的礼物——它将使我经常想到你们.

sentences.en: The clock was given as a retirement gift when he left the police.
sentences.cn: 这个钟表是他退休离开警局时收到的礼物。

sentences.en: The earrings were a gift from my aunt.
sentences.cn: 这副耳环是我姑姑送给我的礼物。

sentences.en: The gift shop's biggest seller is a photo of Nixon meeting Presley.
sentences.cn: 这家礼品店最畅销的商品是尼克松会见猫王普雷斯利的照片。

sentences.en: The gift to the boy is conditioned on his good marks.
sentences.cn: 那孩子得到礼物的条件是取得好成绩.

sentences.en: The surprise gift is a thankyou for our help.
sentences.cn: 这份意外的礼物是为了感谢我们给予的帮助。

sentences.en: The watch was a gift from my mother.
sentences.cn: 这块表是母亲给我的礼物。

sentences.en: There's a little gift shop around the corner.
sentences.cn: 在街角附近有一家小礼品店。

sentences.en: They are naturally good salesmen with the gift of the gab.
sentences.cn: 他们天生就是能说会道的推销能手。

sentences.en: This excellent cookbook would make an ideal gift for anyone just going away to college.
sentences.cn: 这本精美的烹饪书送给要离家上大学的人是很好的礼物。

sentences.en: Would you like the chocolates gift-wrapped?
sentences.cn: 你要把巧克力糖打成礼品包吗？

phrases.phrase: don't look a gift horse in the mouth
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)对发现（或获赠）的东西不要再找茬
（教士俸金或官职）（某人）有权授予

trans.tran_en: something that you give someone, for example to thank them or because you like them, especially on a special occasion
